thread.title_full: Gret New York Experience3 - Review of Kimpton Muse Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: andakama
title: Gret New York Experience3
text:
This hotel was fantastic, great location very close to time square, recently renovated, room was very comfortable and clean, provided toiletries, hair dryer the usual stuff. Had happy hour every afternoon from 5-6pm free for their guest..was fantatsic
Room Tip: no tip, it was excellent See more room tips
